item.title: REST Service
item.description: The rest package provides convenience functions to define a serverless REST style service. The package uses three concepts: Routes: URL paths that resolve to a single go struct Resources: go structs that optionally define HTTP method (GET, POST, etc.). ResourceDefinition: an interface that go structs must implement in order to support resource-based registration. Routes Routes are similar many HTTP-routing libraries. They support path parameters. Resources Resources are the targets of Routes.
